ing: 1/2 red onion, cut into thin half-moon slices
2 tablespoons chopped fresh mint, or more to taste
des: "This summery watermelon mint salad is dressed simply with apple cider vinegar and black pepper."
ins: Toss watermelon, red onion, apple cider vinegar, mint, and black pepper together in a large mixing bowl. Refrigerate until chilled completely, about 1 hour.
